headline: Confluent (CFLT) Soars 30% on $11-Billion IBM Merger
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Delivering Explosive 18-190% Gains. Confluent, Inc. (NASDAQ:CFLT) is one of the last week’s heavy gainers. Confluent soared by 29.9 percent week-on-week, as investors loaded portfolios following news that it was set to be acquired by IBM for $11 billion. On Monday, Confluent, Inc. (NASDAQ:CFLT) said that it officially inked a […]

headline: The Best High-Growth Tech Stocks Outside of the QQQ
summary: As the AI trade continues its sharp recovery after the mid-November fumble that followed some fantastic quarters served up by the tech titans, investors might be wondering if now is a good time to get back in. headline: Is IBM the Top Tech Stock to Buy for 2026?
summary: IBM’s quantum-powered revival might be setting the stage for one of tech’s biggest comeback stories. Is now the time to hop in?
